page.title: 04Royal Visit to Sunnyside
page.content: On Tuesday 16th of July 1985 the {Prince and Princess of Wales}came to {Sunnyside Primary School. For the visit the Princess wore a red and white spotted dress, red coat and a red and white hat. Prince Charles wore a black suit and a red tie.When they arrived, Natalie, who was five that day, presented the Princess with a bouquet of flowers.Then they toured the building starting at the nursery. In the music room the choir and orchestra sang and played for them. When they reached the{partially {sighted unit}the Princess's heart was touched when she saw Claire in her wheelchair and she gave her a flower from her bouquet. Before leaving they signed a photograph for the school as a souvenir of their visit. We all gathered on the car park to cheer as they left.
